metadata.title: CVE-2011-3699 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: John Lim ADOdb Library for PHP 5.11 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated by tests/test-active-record.php and certain other files.

notes.note: tyhicks> It isn't clear if the 5.12 release fixed this issue, which is what ships in Debian unstable.

criterions.comment: libphp-adodb package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
